constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 43 (Monday, March 8, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mrs. BOEBERT:
H.R. 1613.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article I, Section, 8, clause 1: ``provide for the common
Defense''
Article I, Section 8, clause 3: ``regulate commerce with
foreign Nations, and among the several States''
Article I, Section 8, clause 4: ``establish an uniform Rule
of Naturalization''
[Page H1121]

latestAction.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Border Security, Facilitation, and Operations.

title: Stop the Biden Caravan Now Act
